title: Run Workspaces with Directory Watch Triggers

questions.question: When a Directory Watch Trigger is configured to watch for just CREATE events, when will it send a message to trigger any actions connected to it?
options: As soon as a file is added to the directory being monitored.
When a user clicks the Trigger button
After the next poll interval after the file has been added
When a file in the directory has been modified

questions.question: You can only connect one action to any trigger within an Automation.
